path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - SpotOnChain Wallet - v1.2.pdf

findings.title: Failed to attempt locked time is bypassable
findings.description: The setUnlocked() and unlockAttemptFailed() functions used the Datetime API of the Luxon library to calculate the counter of the lock, which can be bypassed by changing the device's time.

findings.title: Do not lock the user despite the user's efforts to enter the incorrect passcode
Allow users to leave the default passcode alone
findings.description: The application creates a default passcode for users which is hardcoded and can be easily leaked by reverse engineering the app, allowing attackers to decrypt credentials.

findings.title: Certain dependencies are insecure
findings.description: Some dependencies used in the application are old and affected by vulnerabilities.
